requirement.original: Convert Airbnb MCP to Claude skill for vacation rentals
requirement.clarified: Create a Claude skill that wraps Airbnb MCP and configure it for accommodation agent. The skill should handle vacation rental search with detailed listing information, host reviews, and amenities.
requirement.what: Create Airbnb skill using progressive disclosure pattern and integrate with accommodation agent
requirement.why: Enable vacation rental and apartment search as alternative to hotels for longer stays and family travel

included: Create airbnb skill file with progressive disclosure pattern
Implement rental search and filtering tools
Set up secure credential management pattern

success_criteria: Accommodation agent configured to use airbnb skill
Credential management follows security best practices
constraints: Must integrate without breaking current functionality

root_cause_analysis.symptom: Accommodation agent lacks vacation rental options
root_cause_analysis.root_cause: No integration with Airbnb for rental listings and apartment search

development_approach.strategy: Create skill using progressive disclosure pattern. Configure accommodation agent to invoke skill alongside jinko-hotel.

mcp_info.name: Airbnb MCP
tools: filter_by_amenities - Filter by amenities and facilities
get_host_reviews - Get host and property reviews
